articles.author: Hayato Huseman
articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S20 FE vs. Google Pixel 4a 5G: Which should you buy? - Android Central
articles.description: This year has seen a huge shift in flagship features being brought to far more affordable price points. With the Galaxy S20 FE and Pixel 4a 5G, you're able to get near-complete experiences with very few trade-offs — so which one is right for you?
articles.content: The Galaxy S20 FE brings a ton of its pricer siblings' features down to a more affordable price. The versatile cameras and 120Hz display are huge wins for the money and you can find the S20 FE for an… [+7778 chars]
